name: Game A Week 2: Phase
description:
This game was made in 5 days (give or take)

Small puzzle/platformer about physics manipulation

Z (Keyboard), A (Gamepad) - Jump

X (Keyboard), X (Gamepad) - Phase/Ground Burst

R (Keyboard), Y (Gamepad) - Restart

Escape (Keyboard), Hold Start (Gamepad) - Close
